text:
Hi! I'm having an issue when deploying our site to a dev account using github actions: we get the following error: *Error:  A HubSpotAuthError has occurred. Error while retrieving new access token: Failed to sign refresh token because refresh token was malformed and could not be decoded. Generate a new refresh token and try again.*
We're using portal_id and personal_access_key in GitHub secrets. Any suggestions?

hmmmm try 2 things. Bump the action version to 1.6
`uses: HubSpot/HubSpot-cms-deploy-action@v1.6`

and then if that doesnâ€™t work then regenerate and update the `personal_access_key`
